name: 尤尚邦
objective:
1.Principles and experiments for the non-destructive testing of metal welding components and structures, including visual inspection, liquid penetrant testing, magnetic particle testing, ultrasonic testing, and radiographic testing.
2.Qualification testing and certification for non-destructive testing personnel.
schedule:
1.Course introduction
2.Introduction to NDT and welding defect
3.Visual testing (VT)
4.Penetrant testing (PT)
5.Application of VT and PT
6.Magnetic particle testing (MT)
7.Application of MT
8.Keynote speech
9.Midterm presentation
10.Midterm presentation
11.Ultrasonic testing (UT)
12.Application of UT
13.Radiographic testing (RT)
14.Application of RT
15.Keynote speech
16.Final presentation
17.Final presentation
18.Conclusion and remark
materials:
Textbooks:
Non-Destructive Testing and Testability of Materials and Structures, Corneloup, Gilles, Gueudré, Cécile, Ploix, Marie-Aude, Academic Press, 2022.
Reference:
書名：非破壞檢測，作者：陳永增、鄧惠源，出版商：全華圖書，出版年：2009
